long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever been annoyed by having to go through hundreds of pages on aliexpress to find something that will come to your house relatively soon? Fear no more! 

With this extension you can select from which country (usually just their warehouse) you want the product to ship and it will display all the products that match your selection.

(!) Please note that this uses their system by appending shipFromCountry=CODE and therefore might not be 100% accurate.

The extension is very simplistic is should be no hassle to use. Simply search for a product on aliexpress and the special menu should pop up (surrounded by a red border)
